page.title: 14FARMS IN 'D' BLOCK 03000138

STILES Rodhuish ST/A 360 4 COMBE -------now farmed by Felons View HIGHER RODHUISH ST-S/C 420 5 HILL -------no longer there. LOWER RODHUISH A 335 4 ESCOTT ----now part of Lower Rodhuish ROADWATER----no longer a working farm. LODGE A 67 2 CLITSOME R/water ST-H 32 2 FELONS VIEW ST-S 280 4 YEA R/water ST-S 123 3 JENKINS Rodhuish D 76 2 DRAGONS CROSS ST-Ch 12 2 CROSSWAYS Bilbrook D 54 2 STEPPS----now a private house. GOLSONCOTT ST/A 165 4
D=Dairy A=Arable S=Sheep ST=Stock Ch=Chicken H=Horse C=Cows FW=Farmworkers including owner.
